message.raw:
Fixed inconsistency where digital outputs connected to the PulseBlaster didn't keep their programmed state for the final PulseBlaster instruction.
They were being reset to zero, wheras all other outputs in labscript aren't reset. PulseBlaster flags now are not reset to zero. It is up to the
LabVIEW state machine and the user's settings there to choose whether to reset outputs to zero or not when an experimental run completes.
